name: GraphicsContext.GradientOptions
desc: Options that affect the rendering of color gradients.

items.name: static var linearColor: GraphicsContext.GradientOptions
items.desc: An option that interpolates between colors in a linear color space.

items.name: static var mirror: GraphicsContext.GradientOptions
items.desc: An option that repeats the gradient outside its nominal range, reflecting every other instance.

items.name: static var `repeat`: GraphicsContext.GradientOptions
items.desc: An option that repeats the gradient outside its nominal range.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new option set from the given raw value.

items.name: let rawValue: UInt32
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.

items.name: typealias Element
items.desc: The element type of the option set.

items.name: typealias ArrayLiteralElement
items.desc: The type of the elements of an array literal.
